name: EmojiHub
description: A simple HTTP API providing access to a database of 1,791 emojis, sorted by categories and groups, for integration into creative applications

about.overview: EmojiHub API, developed by cheatsnake, offers a free and lightweight way to access 1,791 emojis, organized by categories and groups, with endpoints for random selection, filtered lists, and full database retrieval, ideal for enhancing web and mobile applications with expressive visuals.
features: Access to 1,791 emojis with HTML and Unicode codes
Retrieve random emojis or filter by category/group
No authentication required for API access
Built with Go for fast and lightweight performance
useCases: Enhancing chat applications with emoji integration
Building emoji pickers for web or mobile apps
Adding expressive visuals to social media platforms

endpoints.description: Retrieve a random emoji from the database
Fetch all emojis or filter by category or group

quickStart: Make a GET request to https://emojihub.yurace.pro/api/random to fetch a random emoji
Use parameters like 'category' or 'group' with /api/all to filter emojis

authentication.description: No authentication required; simply make GET requests to access emoji data.
